verses.name: Luke 2:1
verses.text: And it came to pass in those days, that there went out a decree from Cesar Augustus, that all the world should be taxed.

verses.name: Luke 2:2
verses.text: (And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria.)

verses.name: Luke 2:3
verses.text: And all went to be taxed, every one into his own city.

verses.name: Luke 2:4
verses.text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee, out of the city of Nazareth, into Judea, unto the city of David, which is called Bethlehem; (because he was of the house and lineage of David:)

verses.name: Luke 2:5
verses.text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife, being great with child.
